title: Riot please take my money! The store is broken
body: Me and two of my friends have been trying to buy RP for a few days now and everytime it says an error has occurred. Anyone else having this problem? I really want to buy some chests :)

replies.body: There could be an issue processing your purchase, but I can't say for sure.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can look into this for you.  It would be best for each of your friends to submit their own ticket for the sake of account security and privacy.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
Hi there. i have already filled out a support ticket about 10 min after I submitted this on the board :) I sure hope you guys can fix this before the project event is over. Thank you for replying :)

You might want to try running through some of the solutions [here ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-)to get your shop back up and running!
Thank you very much, but I have tried most these things and i waited the 24 hours so i no longer know what to do, but thank you!
